snippet: The automaker also reported net income of $183 million for 2011 and said its annual revenue increased 31 percent, to $55 billion.
abstract: Chrysler reports profit of $183 million for 2011 and annual revenue of $55 billion, up 31 percent from 2010, its first full year of positive earnings since 2005.
lead_paragraph: The automaker also reported net income of $183 million for 2011 and said its annual revenue increased 31 percent, to $55 billion.

headline.seo: Chrysler Posts $225 Million Profit in Quarter, Capping Turnaround
headline.main: Chrysler Ends Quarter With a $225 Million Profit
headline.print_headline: Chrysler Ends Quarter With a $225 Million Profit
